meanings.sent1: The inoperculate shellfish had no protective lid.
meanings.sent2: The jar was inoperculate, missing its cover.
meanings.sent3: The inoperculate box kept spilling its contents everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her inoperculate umbrella left her soaked in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The inoperculate phone case offered no protection when dropped.

meanings.definition: Not having a lid or cover.
meanings.sent1: The inoperculate pot had no lid to keep the soup warm.
meanings.sent2: The inoperculate box was open, exposing its contents.
meanings.sent3: The inoperculate cup spilled its contents all over the table.
meanings.sent4: The inoperculate book had its pages exposed to the elements.
meanings.sent5: The inoperculate container failed to keep the food fresh.

meanings.definition: Without a protective flap or covering.
meanings.sent1: The inoperculate envelope was easily torn.
meanings.sent2: The inoperculate package was left vulnerable to damage.
meanings.sent3: The inoperculate tent offered no shelter from the rain.
meanings.sent4: The inoperculate wallet lost its contents on the windy day.
meanings.sent5: The inoperculate mask provided no defense against the dust.
